Deprecated Board Advisor mod

Use Game State for Stamina Refill was improved to use game state and calculations for stamina

Fixed 400 Bad Request errors when usernames start with . or $ in player equipment paths

Refactored autorefill code with helper functions for better maintainability
Added Dungeon Ascension upgrade to inventory database and upgrade keys

Removed Gummy Raider and Yeti from available and selected creatures lists
